pli-tv-kd11:1.1.6: alamattatarā ca → alamatthatarā ca (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:1.3.1: asantuṭṭhitāya → asantuṭṭhiyā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); asantuṭṭhatāya (sya-all); vīriyārambhassa → viriyārambhassa (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed); vīriyārabbhassa (mr); Atha kho bhagavā te → paṇḍukalohitake (sya-all)
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.9: okāsaṃ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti → bhikkhū bhikkhūhi sampayojeti (sya-all)
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.2: āpattiṃ āropetabbo → āpatti āropetabbā (bj, sya-all); āpattiṃ ropetabbo (pts-vp-pli1ed)
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.28: () → (yepi te manussā pubbe saddhā ahesuṃ pasannā tepi etarahi assaddhā appasannā yānipi tāni saṅghassa pubbe dānapathāni tānipi etarahi upacchinnāni riñcanti pesalā bhikkhū nivasanti pāpabhikkhū) (sya-all)
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.9: Adhivāsesuṃ kho therā bhikkhū → adhivāsesuṃ kho te therā bhikkhū (sya-all)
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.13: sudhammo bhikkhu cittassa gahapatino dassanūpacāraṃ avijahāpetvā savanūpacāraṃ avijahāpetvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kārāpetvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhāpetvā taṃ āpattiṃ desāpetabbo”ti → sudhammaṃ bhikkhuṃ … sā āpatti desāpetabbāti (si, sya-all)
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.28: channo bhikkhu saṃghena āpattiyā → channo bhikkhu āpattiyā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.23: na bhikkhu bhikkhūhi bhedetabbo → na bhikkhū bhikkhūhi bhedetabbā (sya-all)
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.4: na garuṃ kariṃsu → na garukariṃsu (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.44: channo bhikkhu saṃghena āpattiyā → channo bhikkhu āpattiyā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.34: gaddhabādhipubbo, saṃghena pāpikāya → gandhabādhipubbo saṅghena pāpikāya (sya-all); gaddhabādhipubbo pāpikāya (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.33: uppannānipi vaḍḍhare → uppannāni ca vaḍḍhare (bj); uppannāpi pavaḍḍhanti (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.151: pañcakāti nāmakā → dve pañcakoti nāmako (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.156: paṭisārī ca → paṭisārīnaṃ (bj); paṭisāri ca (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed); Pabbajjā → pabbajaṃ (bj); pabbājā (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
